representation_information.name: Exchangeable image file format for digital still cameras: Exif, Version 2.2
representation_information.description: Exif specifications define a pair of file types, mainly intended for digital photography and based on existing image formats (TIFF and JPEG). The Exif metadata, primarily technical metadata associated with camera settings, is shared by the two file types and represents an extension of the underlying file types.

relation.title: Sustainability of Digital Formats: Planning for Library of Congress Collections
